confusables: hop , jump, skip

source.author: Christopher Solomon
source.title: How Hops Became the Star of American Brewing

exampleSentences.sentence: Almost all of the nation’s beer hops—and roughly 40 percent of all hops in the world—are grown by about 75 farms in Washington, Oregon, and Idaho, many of them owned by families who have farmed hops for four or five generations.

source.author: Shelly Fan
source.title: How Machine Learning Made Hops-Free Hoppy Beer (and Other SynBio Wonders) Possible

exampleSentences.sentence: Although many people like hops in beer, the team said, growing actual hops requires enormous amounts of water and energy, which makes the taste highly variable between crops.

source.author: Eugene Robinson
source.title: Getting to the Dance With Debbie Allen

exampleSentences.sentence: Even though we wanted to go to the sock hop and party and do all those things and go to the circus like any other kid, we were exposed to other things.

source.author: Carolyn Beans
source.title: How does a crop’s environment shape a food’s smell and taste?

exampleSentences.sentence: Breeding hop varieties to have lower concentrations could diminish the “beer creep” problem faced by large-volume craft brewers who distribute their beer over long distances.

source.author: Carolyn Beans
source.title: How does a crop’s environment shape a food’s smell and taste?

exampleSentences.sentence: Brewers call that volatile release “beer creep,” says Paul Matthews, a senior research scientist in the Washington state branch of Hopsteiner, an international commercial hop grower and processor headquartered in New York City.

source.author: Carolyn Beans
source.title: How does a crop’s environment shape a food’s smell and taste?

exampleSentences.sentence: At each location, the team measured the concentrations of four aroma glycosides in each hop cultivar.

source.author: Kristina Monllos
source.title: ‘We can work all over the place’: How being fully remote has helped one young branding agency become a global player

exampleSentences.sentence: To stay connected in real time employees will either communicate via Slack or go old school and hop on a call.
What more could one desire of him, I pray, Than just to hop around and stand for K?

source.title: Boys and Girls Bookshelf; a Practical Plan of Character Building, Volume I (of 17)
source.author: Various

exampleSentences.sentence: The Kangaroo can hop and hop and hop; Somehow he never seems to want to stop.

source.title: Boys and Girls Bookshelf; a Practical Plan of Character Building, Volume I (of 17)
source.author: Various

exampleSentences.sentence: He skirted the place with a quick goosey hop, stumbled a little and felt panic, but made it all right to the office.
